programme.desc: Talkshow that shows fun talk with guest stars.

programme.title: Garam dan Madu Aku Biro Kamu Mau?
programme.desc: A beautiful girl named Fuji (Larasati Nugroho), the owner of a matchmaking agency. One day, Fuji gets a client, a barbershop owner's son named Ivan (Arya Vasco). From there, Ivan is asked by his mother to find a partner. Until finally, Ivan, the barbershop owner, says, "Why don't you be my partner, and I introduce you to my mother?"

programme.title: Mahkotamu Ketinggalan di DC Cakung Queen
programme.desc: Keyla was shocked to meet Roy at the market. Roy accidentally saw Keyla, Keyla immediately ran into the market and accidentally hit Yudi in the market. The fruit that Yudi brought was all messed up. Keyla rushed to avoid Roy. Keyla wanted to find her family who had been separated for a long time.

programme.title: MAKAN TEROOOS - EP 23
programme.desc: Explore culinary references that serve authentic flavors. Follow the culinary adventure of Indonesia only at Makan Terooos.

programme.title: BALI TRADISI - EP 24
programme.desc: A semi documentary that show about the traditions that has been passed down in Bali.

programme.title: NAWAITU SURGA 2022 - EP 28
programme.desc: New Version of Nawaitu Surga which is program that teaches about behavior in life through the guidance of a leading Ustad

programme.title: LIGA DANGDUT 2021 - EP 17
programme.desc: 70 Ambassadors from 34 Provinces compete for the Champion of the Largest Dangdut Competition in Indonesia. Best display, spectacular stage.

programme.title: Dikira Anak APT APT Enggak Baik?
programme.desc: Zahwa (Jennifer Eve) is stressed and annoyed with her boss, Adit (Ridho Illahi), who asks her to sell multiple apartment units in a single day as a salesperson. However, that annoyance slowly turns into the seeds of love.

programme.title: Keliatan Banget Nyenggol Hati King Dosen
programme.desc: As Galang passed by, a man wearing the same jacket ran past him. Moments later, the man came chasing after Erin's purse snatcher. Galang was nearly beaten by the mob. Galang was accused of stealing Erin's wallet. Ultimately, Galang was saved and acquitted. Erin searched for the house address and managed to find Lalu, who introduced himself as Johan's son. It turned out that Erin had been searching for her family.

programme.title: LIGA DANGDUT 2021 - EP 17
programme.desc: 70 Ambassadors from 34 Provinces compete for the Champion of the Largest Dangdut Competition in Indonesia. Best display, spectacular stage.

programme.title: BY THE WAY - EP 7
programme.desc: Talkshow that shows fun talk with guest stars.

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 17 - EP 31
programme.desc: With the theme of Heaven's Fugitive, Bang Jack has to deal with debt collectors who have minimal religious knowledge to teach them to become sharia-compliant debt collectors.

programme.title: JAMU STRONG BIKIN CINTAKU MAKIN KUAT
programme.desc: Valerie Tifanka, the herbal medicine seller, always faithfully accompanies Christ Laurent, who is in a tight spot on his mission to find his father in the city.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 29
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Akan Aku Treat Kamu Bagaikan Ratu
programme.desc: I Will Treat You Like a Queen tells the story of Naomi, a beautiful, simple girl who never thought that her biological mother was actually rich. She owns a large company that is also managed by Tristan. Because Naomi initially lived on the streets, her mother told Tristan to transform Naomi into an elegant woman. Naomi had to follow her mother and follow all the rules given and even had to learn to manage office work.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 483
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 9
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.desc: Inem (Michelle Ziudith) has just returned from her village to Jakarta for work. While chasing a thief, she accidentally breaks Bobi's (Fendy Chow) tripod, which upsets him. It turns out Inem is working at his house, further infuriating him.

programme.title: Mendang Mending Tar Bilek Lagi
programme.desc: Mendang Mending Tar Bilek Lagi tells the story of a couple named Sam (Hardi Fadillah) and Alea (Andi Viola) who dated in high school but eventually broke up. Recently, they have become close again because they both feel they are not compatible with their current partners.

programme.title: Duren Caem Gini Masa Iya Disekip
programme.desc: A handsome widower named Doni who has two children, a girl and a boy. Doni, who is alone after his wife passed away, actually needs a life partner, but Doni is reluctant to date. On the other hand, there is a woman named Wita who plans a kidnapping in a big house with her boyfriend. To smooth her plan, Wita disguises herself as Dewi and becomes a babysitter at the house she is targeting, namely Doni's house.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 10

programme.title: JANGAN ADA KUDA DIANTARA KITA
programme.desc: Finally Ayu (Angelica Simperler) can see the horse racing venue. While watching the horse race, Ayu is pickpocketed, fortunately there is Bima (Lucky Perdana) who immediately stops the pickpocket along with Jalu, his horse. But unfortunately luck is not on Bima's side, Jalu is stolen and he can't do anything, even Bima suffers a back injury. Bima decides to go to the village to calm down because he lost Jalu. Bima then meets Ayu again.

programme.desc: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series kisah tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.

programme.title: Kiah Pekasam - EP 2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Kiah yang sangat jujur di dalam percakapannya memulakan kehidupan baru di kampungnya.

programme.title: Biniku Ninja - EP 1
programme.desc: Azlan berasal dari keluarga susah yang akhirnya berjaya merantau ke UK setelah mendapat tawaran menyambung ijazah dalam aliran seni. Kisah bermula apabila beliau berjumpa dengan seorang gadis

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Mimi Mencari Cinta - EP 1
programme.desc: Kisah Mimi seorang gadis yang cantik menawan bekerja di sebuah pasaraya ingin segera mencari pasangan hidup walaupun terpaksa buntu memilih di antara dua orang adik-beradik.

programme.title: Tanya Sama Pokok - EP 7
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kehidupan di sebuah kampung moden yang sudah semakin terdedah dengan kemodenan tetapi dalam waktu yang sama masih mengekalkan ciri-ciri hidup berkampung.

programme.title: Joras & Stars - EP 2

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali - EP 3

programme.title: 3 dara kg.com - EP 20

programme.title: Opah Popular - EP 4

programme.title: Joras & Stars - EP 3

programme.title: Pulau Ke Pulau - EP 11

programme.title: Pura-Pura Kaya - EP 10

programme.title: Jep & Judin - EP 6

programme.title: 123 Glamour - EP 9
programme.desc: Saksikan peserta mempersembahkan bakat mereka kepada barisan juri dan siapakh di antara mereka yang berjaya menarik hati para juri untuk bergelar juara?

programme.title: Temasya Sukan Kelaut - EP 3

programme.title: Prankap Show - EP 1

He coaxes her to be his girlfriend, but she isn't interested in anything more than friendship. Release Year: 2017 Director: Mohit Suri Awards: 2018 Winner Viewers' Choice Award- Best Song of the Year, 2018 Winner Listeners' Choice Award- Best Song, 2018 Winner Critics' Award- Best Singer - Female- Shreya Ghoshal

programme.title: Flight

programme.desc: After serving time for killing her abusive father, Shabana is recruited by an Indian spy agency for a highly classified mission. Release Year: 2017 Director: Shivam Nair Awards: 2018 Winner Special Award- Extraordinary Impact ActreSS- Taapsee Pannu

programme.desc: Watch behind the scenes and meet the cast and crew of the movie.

programme.desc: Story of a generation of young boys and girls who stay away from home, date and almost get married. They have decided their own rights and wrongs and they may not be the same as others.

programme.desc: The story is about a rich spoiled girl who does not want to get married and hires a husband.

programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: Louis Et La Faune Urbaine - EP 10
programme.desc: Louis answers a call from someone with a whole menagerie of animals living under a garden shed, and another client who has an assortment of wildlife living in their loft space.

programme.title: C'est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 10
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 13
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 26
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 43
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 25
programme.desc: The three evil Komians advance towards the weakened Komians to destroy them but an invisible force attacks them. Pokou confronts Ebri Morrow and manages to vanquish him.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 26
programme.desc: Pokou, Lucio, N'zi and Ebri Morrow arrive in the camp. A few days later, all the members of the council meet before the King.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place

programme.title: Temps Present - EP 13
programme.desc: Suppliers in distress, invoices never paid, harassment swept under the rug and staff under pressure: what is happening at Implenia, Switzerland's construction leader?

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes - EP 2
programme.desc: Along the Atlantic coast to the English Channel stretches a rich but fragile coastline. From the Vendee marshes to the Arcachon basin, passing through the bay of Saint-Malo and the fort of Fouras in Charente-Maritime, local actors are intensely involved in preserving nature and heritage.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 7
programme.desc: The Czech capital transports visitors through the ages. Prague, a city steeped in magic, by the legendary presence of alchemists in the 16th century, but especially by the multiple cultures that have intertwined there. Classified as a UNESCO World Heritage site, the old town attracts millions of tourists every year.

programme.title: Roc D'azur 2025
programme.desc: Each October, since 1984, Frejus welcomes Roc d'Azur, the world's largest mountain bike event. A sports gathering that, over the years, has become the leading competition for all-terrain bikes with nearly 20,000 participants. A look back at the highlights of the 2025 event.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 7
programme.desc: Paule is falling increasingly in love with Julien, a situation firmly disapproved of by the law firm. Consumed by guilt, Irene is determined to watch over her, to the point of following her into the most extreme situations. Together they even go as far as exhuming a victim's body...

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 8
programme.desc: Paule and Irene take a major pharmaceutical company to court for having marketed a drug dangerous for young children. By working together they manage to win the confidence of a cardiologist, a whistle-blower sidelined by her superior because of her accusations.

programme.desc: Shola Ameobi joins Will Perry on 1-to-11 to select his all-time best eleven teammates. They dig into his career, recalling standout players and memorable moments.

programme.title: PREMIER LEAGUE LIVE (Live)
programme.desc: Highlight match action from the Premier League's 2025/26 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 26
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier League's greatest ever players.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 17
programme.desc: With Djibril Cisse. A former Premier League star sits down to select the best team they played with, guiding us through their picks from 1-to-11 and including insights and anecdotes from on and off the pitch.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 11
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: Ahead of the first North London derby of the season, we sit down with the man who made one of most controversial transfers in World football; Sol Campbell. He opens up about his decision to leave Tottenham for their fiercest rivals, Arsenal, the intense pressure of returning to White Hart Lane that first season, and how he's dealt with the fallout ever since. A fascinating insight into the 'move that shook North London'.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 25/26 MW14 Fulham v Manchester City
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2025/26 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2025/26 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 49
programme.desc: From humble beginnings, Djibril Cisse set French football alight under the tutelage of legendary coach Guy Roux, before finding himself filling the boots of Michael Owen at Liverpool. Horrific injuries, miraculous comebacks and trophies would follow in the dramatic career of one of football's most enigmatic characters.

programme.title: PL BEST OF... PREMIER LEAGUE FRENCH CONNECTION
programme.desc: A celebration of France's greatest football icons, featuring Thierry Henry, David Ginola, Robert Pires, Claude Makelele, Emmanuel Petit and many more.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 12
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Giroud's career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of football's most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 17
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: 1-to-11 2025/26 - EP 5
programme.desc: Known simply as ‘The Yak,’ Yakubu takes on 1-to-11, selecting his ultimate lineup from the best players he shared the pitch with. A powerhouse striker with 95 Premier League goals across spells at Portsmouth, Middlesbrough, Everton, and Blackburn, he reflects on the teammates who made the biggest impression during his career. Expect a team full of strength, flair, and goalscoring pedigree.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 16
programme.desc: Few players have had a journey to the Premier League like Brentford's Igor Thiago. Ten years ago, he was working as a bricklayer on the outskirts of Brasilia to support his family. programme.title: FS MMA Fedor Emelianenko vs. Eric Pele
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! MMA legend Fedor Emelianenko is slated to fight Eric Pele in St. Petersburg, Russian. This fight does not go past the first round and ends in a flurry of punches for one fighter.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Ward vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features light heavyweights Andre 'S.O.G.' Ward (25-0, 13 KOs) vs. Chad Dawson (31-1, 17 KOs) in a championship contest from the Oracle Arena in Oakland, California, USA, on September 8, 2012. A paid attendance of 7,611 brought in a gate of $706,469 and 1.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Canelo Alvarez vs. Carlos Baldomir
programme.desc: This episode features then-WBC silver light middleweight champion Saul (Canelo) Alvarez looking to give Carlos Baldomir his first career KO loss, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Luis Collazo for the interim WBC welterweight championship. Collazo injures his hand early on, but has to keep pushing forward.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Shodai, Kagayaki, Mitakeumi and Tochiozan from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S6) - EP 7
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'strawberry', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: It's the annual go-kart race, and Zip has chosen the racecourse, but is worried it isn't as fun as the ones before, so he tries to make the racecourse more exciting.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 15
programme.desc: Why has the sky in OKIDO turned so red? With the help of Zim, Zam and Zoom, the friends go on a trip in the rocket to find out.

programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 38
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 12
programme.desc: When they're accidentally shut in the shed, Duggee shows the Squirrels how to make the time pass with calm breathing and made-up games. The Squirrels cope so well. Does Duggee?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels find Duggee's cheerleader pompoms, so he shows them his old moves. Time to practice: Duggee at the chess board, the Squirrels as a squad. There's a big match ahead...

programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch takes the quadriga from the Brandenburg Gate, the Go Jetters must stop him before he reaches Grim HQ.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 48
programme.desc: Bluey, Snickers, and Winton are on their way to ask Calypso for help with their problems, when they are ambushed by the Terriers and use their unique talents to get past.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: On Jen's birthday she and Andy are sent to follow a new baby elephant to make sure it can use it's trunk properly.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Charli and her disability assistance dog Tinks visit a Hobby Fair at Woofton Town Hall, where Charli is selling all the clever things she makes.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet a flightless bird called a cassowary. Then, they watch the Sunda gharial crocodilian being fed some fish and reveal an amazing connection they have with the cassowary.

programme.title: Playtime Towers (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Bella plays with her favourite cup - it makes the perfect drum for a sing along with Lift. Together, they visit Kingsley and Queenie who play the 'Tea Party Dash', but who will win?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 9
programme.desc: Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the things trees do for creatures around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 28
programme.desc: Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 10

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 11

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 12

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 17

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: It’s Pandy’s birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him it’s even better - now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 45
programme.desc: The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 44
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: When the adults exclude the kids from their adult-only cave, the kids make their own much cooler cave, soon making the adults want to switch caves.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 - EP 43
programme.desc: In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruz’s help to perform a dance for Mom’s birthday. programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first "tuskist" appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he’s a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn’t go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis’ backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 8

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Australia is one of the most diverse countries on earth with over 80percent of its animals found nowhere else in the world. This series explores wildlife's unique traits revealing the creative, aggressive, social and curious.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Moments S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: New arrivals like cats, rabbits, cane toads and wild horses have decimated Australia's native flora and fauna, and now the pressure's on to bring our native icons back from the brink of extinction.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: With climate change pushing rice farmers to the brink in Vietnam's Mekong Delta, we meet two soil scientists who are using an innovative technology to help farmers adapt.

programme.title: First Generation S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: First Generation follows nine inspiring people from the Asia-Pacific who built new lives and forged their own path. Their stories celebrate ambition, belonging, and the diverse spirit that defines modern Australia.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 190
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 241
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday bring you the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Charles Brice, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 241
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 241
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Landline (2025) - EP 41
programme.desc: Celebrating 80 years of the Country Hour. We look at how farming has changed since Australia's longest running radio program first went to air on 3 December 1945.

programme.title: The Chef's Garden S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Chef Massimo Mele pairs delicious Tongola goat curd with freshly-picked beetroot and vegetables. Then it's into the pure Tassie waters where Massimo samples some of the world's best oysters.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Path S33 - EP 24
programme.desc: We meet Dexter Burgos, a rare indoor plant collector who is part of a plant-loving family that has transformed their lounge room into a tissue culture lab.

programme.title: Boyer Lecture 2025: Justin Wolfers
programme.desc: Justin Wolfers, economist and public policy scholar, delivers the Boyer Lecture titled "Australia is Freaking Amazing" delving into the theme Australia: A Radical Experiment in Democracy and our strong institutions.

programme.title: If You're Listening (2025) - EP 37
programme.desc: For the last decade or so, there's been a lot of talk about how the Chinese government uses technology to issue social credit scores to its citizens. But does this dystopian AI powered surveillance system actually even exist?

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Marc Fennell is on a scavenger hunt for pieces of a mysterious, ancient Palestinian Mosaic, when put together, reveals how the British Empire shaped the modern Middle East.

programme.title: Art Works S2 - EP 28

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 1
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 2
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 1
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of China’s economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 2
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of China’s economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s Inside India gives you news and market commentary on the emerging powerhouse, businesses and people behind its rise. Inside India goes beyond the headlines to give you the edge and insights - this is your gateway to the India story.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s Inside India gives you news and market commentary on the emerging powerhouse, businesses and people behind its rise. Inside India goes beyond the headlines to give you the edge and insights - this is your gateway to the India story.

programme.title: Access Middle East - EP 1
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: Access Middle East - EP 2
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: U.S. Markets Edition - EP 138
programme.desc: U.S. Markets Edition delivers key takeaways from the most impactful interviews and insights from CNBC’s programming in the US. As global markets become more interconnected, this program ensures audiences in Asia stay informed on major developments shaping the business world overnight.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 1
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 2
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe - EP 1
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Julianna Tatelbaum take on the most complex stories of the day with instant analysis on how you can make your money work around the news.

programme.title: Worldwide Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.desc: "Squawk Box" is the ultimate pre-market morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories. programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: Global Business

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: The Exorcist's Meter - EP 17
programme.desc: A taxi driver unwittingly releases the curse of a 100-year-old spirit and begins to battle demons.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 & What's On Today - EP 15
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2693
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 9
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: Funny Funny Home
programme.desc: A game show focused on common household problems and trivia, contestants participate in challenges and answer questions related to daily home life. Through humour and friendly competition, the programme aims to offer practical solutions and tips for better living at home.

programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 15
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 4
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2094
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 21
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] While covertly tailing Auyeung Kwan, Chow Chun-kit is full of doubts. However, when Chow Chun-kit finds out Auyeung Kwan often misses him at the cha chaan teng where he met Kwong, he believes he is not the mole. But Auyeung Kwan reminds Chow Chun-kit to be wary of Lui Hok-sum’s unusual maneuvers, and in particular, his suspicious behavior and the scheme behind.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 28
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2094
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 26
programme.desc: Sau-yi accidentally hears Ka-pik speaking with someone on the phone. He is shocked to realize Chi-bun is Ko Sing’s son. Ko Sing abruptly dies due to some traffic accident. He called Sau-yi and also Ka-pik before his death. But the duo deny they have something to do with this matter. Ko Tsun gets drunk and then tells Ho-yee about Chi-bun’s true background.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven - EP 15
programme.desc: A girl disappears from the world due to the Bobble Incident, and seven wicked people are involved in the incident. Who will be able to survive this bloody revenge?

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 4
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 29
programme.desc: Kwun-fung tells Cheung Hei about some new experimental drug that could alleviate Tin-cho’s condition. Although there are risks involved, but she has faith in Kwun-fung’s authoritative status. She decides to sign up for Tin-cho. Yau-sin comes up with all kinds of ideas and eventually manages to flee. Actually, there is some other reason behind the scheme.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 767
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2094
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 5
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Actually, Lau Yu-fan’s plan is for Chow Chun-kit and Ko Ho-yin to take turns to hold back Tai Cho-fuk so that they have time to prepare legal documents for his arrest and apply for a search warrant for Kin Fung Group. Lau Yu-fan goes to the prison to see Lee Nga-man as he hopes she has some way to make Tai Wing-keung come back to testify against Tai Cho-fuk.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 29
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2095
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 27
programme.desc: Sau-yi talks about certain issues before Hon-yeung’s grave. Ko Tsun confirms Ko Sing saw Sau-yi before his death. Niki comes round. Sau-yan wants to step down as he hopes Ho-yee and Sau-yi team up to defend Yau’s. Ho-yee objects to Sau-yi taking Yau’s public. Chi-bun wants to realize cash flow quickly as he is going somewhere overseas for good.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 767
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 16
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 5
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 30
programme.desc: Chun-sum and Wai-lik set up a command post. The rooftop is sealed off so as to let to let the expert go there to go about their business. The terrorists release clips to make people nervous. Police want to evacuate people in the district. Ka-yu finds out Wai-lik is in a building where a bomb is planted. She just fearlessly approaches the building.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 768
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2095
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 6
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 23
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] After the failed Eagle Nest operation, Lui Hok-sum has been unhappy about Tai Cho-fuk’s high profile. And for several months, ICAC investigation causes Lui Hok-sum to decide to draw a line between himself and Tai Cho-fuk. Lui Hok-sum is suspended from duty as he is under investigation.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 30
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2096
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 28
programme.desc: Chi-bun and Sau-yi have a row. Sau-yi vents his anger by beating Chi-bun up. While hitting back, Chi-bun inadvertently kills Sau-yi. Counsel Tong tells Chi-tung Sau-yi had amended his will. Meanwhile, Ko Tsun has told Chi-tung some secret about Chi-bun’s background. The duo and Inspector Lau coincidentally reckon Chi-bun has the greatest motive for committing homicide.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 768
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 12
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 1
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 17
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 26
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 2
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 2
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 18
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 27
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 4
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 5
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.
